Name: Stone of Balance
Effect: Increases all damage by 7%.
How To Get: Can be found on Yaesha. Random drop.

Name: Stone of Continuance
Effect: Increases Skill Duration by 25%.
How To Get: Can be found in N'Erud - Tower of the Unseen. Random Drop.

Name: Stone of Expanse
Effect: Increases Ranged damage by 12%. Reduces all other damage dealt by 6%.
How To Get: Can be found in N'Erud.

Name: Stone Of Malevolence
Effect: Elemental Status damage generates 15% additional Mod Power.
How To Get: Can be found in Losomn - random world drop.

Name: Stream Coupler
Effect: Using a Skill regenerates 10% of Max Health over 5s.
How To Get: Can be found in Losomn - Cotton's Kiln, random world drop.

Name: Subterfuge Link
Effect: After killing an enemy, increases the Cast Speed of the next Mod or Skill Cast by 35%. Lasts 15s or until consumed.
How To Get: Can be found in N'Erud.

Name: Suppression Ward
Effect: Prevents SUPPRESSION Blight.
How To Get:
Can be found in N'Erud.
Can be crafted at Drzyr Replicator, you will need the following Materials: x5 Iron, 250 Scrap.

Name: Targeting Jewel
Effect: Increases Range on all Firearms by 4m. Reduces Spread by 15%.
How To Get: Can be found in N'Erud.

Name: Tarnished Ring
Effect: Increases damage of Unarmed Attacks by 30%.
How To Get:
It can be found in Ward 13.
Near the armor merchant, there is a ladder, climb that ladder and talk to the man on the bed. He'll mention a story, keep interacting with him until he gives you the ring.

Name: Tear of Kaeula
Effect: Increases Relic capacity by 2 while equipped
How To Get: Can be found in Yaesha - Kaeula's Rest.

Name: Tempest Conduit
Effect: After receiving Elemental Damage, increases all damage dealt by 10% and Resistance to the received Element by 20 for 20s.
How To Get: Can be found in Yaesha - Endaira's End.

Name: Tightly Wound Coil
Effect: When spending 75% or more of current magazine, gain a SHIELD ofr 15% of Max Health for 5s. Does not stack with itself.
How To Get: Can be found in N'Erud - Void Vessel Facility.

Name: Timekeeper's Jewel
Effect: Increases the duration of all Status Effects applied by wearer. Durations varies per status.
How To Get: Can be found in Losomn at the top of the Hewdas Clock. Open the chest near one of the windows to find it.

Name: Tomb Dweller's Ring
Effect: Increases Movement Speed by 10% for 7s after Vaulting, Climbing, Leaping, and entering Water, stacks 3x. Reduces Fall Damage by 25%.
How To Get: Can be found in Yaesha - The Lamentafter going through a hidden passageway.

Name: Vacuum Seal
Effect: Increases Automatic Pickup Range for Scrap by 150%. Picking up Scrap, Iron, or Ammo grants a SHIELD for 15% of Max Health for l0s Does not stack.
How To Get: Can be found in N'Erud - Tower of the Unseen. Random Drop.

Name: Vestige of Power
Effect: After 7s of not being damaged, increases Ranged and Melee Damage by 10%.
How To Get: Can be found in Yaesha - The Chimney - Faithless Thicket

Name: Wax Sealed Ring
Effect: Killing blows increase Ranged and Melee Damage by 4% for 15s. Stacks 3x.
How To Get: Can be found in Yaesha - The Far Woods.

Name: White Glass Bead
Effect: Perfect Dodge applies a SHIELD for 15% of Max Health. Lasts 10s. Cannot Stack with itself.
How To Get: Acquired by insisting Leywise eat the Feast Master's Leftovers given to you by the Feastmaster in The Great Hall assuming you've met Leywise prior to the conversation on the same world roll of The Awakened King DLC. This also unlocks an Achievement called A Foul Feast.

Name: White Pawn Stamp
Effect: Reduces Mod Power Requirement by 10%.
How To Get: Can be found in Losomn. Player needs to complete The Flames Event using only the White Flames.

Name: Wind Hollow Circlet
Effect: Increases Reload Speed by 12%.
How To Get: Can be found in Yaesha - Endaira's End.

Name: Wood Ring
Effect: Increases Stagger Damage by 15%
How To Get: Can be found in Losomn as a random drop.

Name: Worn Admiral's Ring
Effect: All damage received is increased by 200%. All damage dealt is increased by 10%.
How To Get: Can be bought from Reggie at Ward 13 for 500

Name: Zania's Malice
Effect: Dealing Weakspot damage increases Weakspot damage by 10% for 7s. Stacks 3x.
How To Get: Can be found in Root Earth - Ashen Wasteland.

Name: Zohee's Ring
Effect: Increases Mod Duration by 15%.
How To Get: Can be found in Yaesha - Red Throne. Given to the player by Queen's Assistant after defeating the Corruptor, if Arrest  event was triggered.
